Recommendation: Reach out to a trusted friend or support group for help.
Effect: Social support can reduce feelings of isolation.

Recommendation: Practice a creative hobby like drawing, music, or writing.
Effect: Creative activities can help process emotions and relieve stress.

Recommendation: Keep up your positive habits and encourage others to do the same.
Effect: Positive routines help maintain low stress.

Recommendation: Take a break from technology and spend time outdoors.
Effect: Nature and fresh air can boost your mood.

Recommendation: Volunteer or help someone in need to shift your focus.
Effect: Helping others can increase your own sense of purpose.

Recommendation: Try journaling your thoughts and feelings each day.
Effect: Journaling can help you process and manage stress.

Recommendation: Set small, achievable goals and celebrate your progress.
Effect: Small wins build confidence and motivation.

Recommendation: Practice mindfulness or meditation for a few minutes daily.
Effect: Mindfulness can help you stay grounded and calm.

Recommendation: Limit news and social media consumption if it increases your stress.
Effect: Reducing exposure to negativity can improve your outlook.

Recommendation: Ask for professional help if stress feels unmanageable.
Effect: Professional support can provide new coping tools.

Recommendation: Reflect on your strengths and past successes during tough times.
Effect: Remembering your strengths can boost resilience.

Recommendation: Create a daily routine to add structure to your day.
Effect: Routine can provide stability and reduce anxiety.

Recommendation: Express gratitude by noting three good things each day.
Effect: Gratitude can improve your mood and perspective.

Recommendation: Try a new activity or learn a new skill to shift your focus.
Effect: Learning can provide a sense of accomplishment.

Recommendation: If you feel unsafe, contact a trusted adult or helpline immediately.
Effect: Your safety is the top priority.
